article: a u.s. marine accused of masterminding a plot to kidnap and kill an iraqi civilian told his squad , `` gents , we just got away with murder '' after firing three fatal rounds into the man 's head , a prosecutor said tuesday .
abstract: cases of us marines accused in iraqi civilian s murder go to juries
